mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_nickname, user_phone_number, user_email, user_address, user_gender) values(#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userNickName}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{userEmail}, #{userAddress}, #{userGender})
mapper.select: select user_number from tbl_user where user_id = #{userId} and user_password = #{userPassword}

select pr.user_profile_image_system_name, ur.user_name, ur.user_nickname,ur.user_birth, ur.user_phone_number, ur.user_email, ur.user_address,ur.user_self_introduction from tbl_user ur join tbl_user_profile_image pr on ur.user_number = pr.user_number where ur.user_number = #{userNumber}

select tu.user_number, tu.user_name, tu.user_nickname, tupi.user_profile_image_system_name from tbl_user tu join tbl_user_profile_image tupi on tupi.user_number = tu.user_number where user_name like concat('%', #{findUser} , '%') or user_nickname like concat('%', #{findUser} , '%')
